DOC.brief_summary: Gut microflora-mucosal interaction may involve pathogenesis irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) . The purpose study investigate efficacy Duolac7S change colonic microflora improve symptom IBS sufferer . In , 64 patient Rome III positive diarrhea type IBS complete 6-week multiple centre control clinical trial . Patients randomize receive either 2 capsules/day Duolac7S 2 capsules/day placebo . IBS symptom monitor scored accord Likert scale . Changes faecal microflora , stool frequency form , quality life ( QOL ) score also monitor .
